backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor defining residents, profiles, and record types with access control, plus CRUD and query logic for the resident directory and related data.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module converting old actor state to the new structure by initializing a new residents directory and carrying over existing maps.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented frontend tasks, related files, components, and test IDs for residents directory integration.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON document containing prewritten summaries for various frontend files describing their roles in routing, UI, queries, and styling.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based CSS defining OKLCH color tokens, theming variables, dark mode overrides, and base element styling.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entry point setting up the root element and loading the main React application script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up React Router and React Query, wraps routes in an authentication gate, and defines core application routing including dashboard and resident profile pages.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProtectedGa: Authentication gate that initializes identity, shows a sign‑in screen with branding when unauthenticated, and renders children when logged in.
frontend/src/components/maui/MauiAppShel: App shell component providing header, navigation, page layout, and sign‑out logic that clears identity and React Query cache.
frontend/src/components/maui/MauiNav.tsx: Simple navigation bar showing a Dashboard link with active‑state styling based on the current route.
frontend/src/components/maui/residents/A: Dialog component for adding a new resident with form validation and mutation to create the resident.
frontend/src/components/maui/residents/a: Dialog for adding an ADL record with required fields, identity validation, and mutation to save the record.
Displays, sorts, and deletes ADL records for a resident with loading and empty states.
Re-exports ADL record dialog and history list components.
frontend/src/components/maui/residents/E: Dialog for editing a resident’s detailed information including physicians, with validation and save handling.
frontend/src/components/maui/residents/m: Dialog form for creating a MAR record using selected medication and nurse identity.
Re-exports MAR dialog and history list components.
Lists, formats, sorts, and deletes MAR records with loading and empty states.
Dialog for adding a medication with dosage, route, times, prescriber, and notes.
frontend/src/components/maui/residents/R: Displays resident details in a card with options to view profile, toggle status, and delete.
Header section for the resident dashboard with title and an add-resident button.
Provides UI controls for filtering residents by room and sorting by various criteria.
Renders a responsive grid of resident cards or a fallback message when empty.
Displays KPI cards showing counts of total, active, and discharged residents.
Tabs for filtering residents by status: All, Active, or Discharged.
frontend/src/components/maui/residents/v: Dialog for recording daily vitals, validating fields, and submitting a vitals entry.
Lists and displays resident vitals history with delete support, loading states, and oxygen-level status badges.
frontend/src/components/references/Missi: Shows a placeholder card detailing missing reference materials with categorized lists and a link to the full checklist.
frontend/src/hooks/residentQueryKeys.ts: Provides centralized resident-related React Query keys scoped by principal ID.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the authenticated or anonymous backend actor, invalidating dependent queries on identity change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, handling login, stored identity loading, and state tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for user profiles, residents, and vitals using the backend actor and principal-scoped keys.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles, light/dark theme variables, and print-specific CSS rules.
frontend/src/lib/brand.ts: Exports branding constants such as logo path and facility name.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Exports a utility function for merging Tailwind and clsx class names.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider, then renders the root component.
frontend/src/pages/maui/Dashboard.tsx: Main resident dashboard that loads residents, applies filters/sorting, computes KPIs, and displays grid and actions.
frontend/src/pages/maui/residents/mockRe: Provides mock medication data for residents, with special cases for specific IDs.
Defines resident profile data structures and provides fallback mock profile data.
Contains a list of mock residents with basic demographic and room info.
frontend/src/pages/maui/residents/reside: Maps backend resident records to UI view models including age calculation and placeholders.
Utility functions for filtering, sorting, KPI calculation, and extracting unique rooms from resident lists.
frontend/src/pages/maui/residents/Reside: Displays a detailed resident profile using backend or mock data with tabs for vitals, MAR, ADL, and medications.
Print‑optimized component rendering resident info and medications in a formatted report layout.
frontend/src/pages/references/MoritzRefe: Page outlining required reference screenshots and design details for recreating the Maui Lane UI.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL parameters, persist them in sessionStorage, and remove them from hash-based routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending colors, layout, animations, and enabling typography, container query, and animation plugins.
project_state.json: JSON describing the project's current state, including version, goals, and a list of implemented features with metadata.
